newsitem.title: USA: Cali Realty Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Cali Realty Q3 net rises.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: 1996 third quarter fund from operations before minority interest and after adjustment for straight-lining of rents amounted to $11,071,000 or $0.56 per share compared to $6,573,000 or $0.49 per share for the quarter ended September 30, 1995.

For the nine months ended September 30, 1996, funds from operations before minority interest and after adjustment for straight-lining of rents amounted to $30,043,0000 or $1.62 per share versus $19,307,000 or $1.45 per share for the nine months ended September 30, 1995.
For the 1996 third quarter, income before minority interest was $7,644,000 compared to $4,184,000 in the year-ago period.

For the nine months ended September 30, 1996, income before gain on sale of property, minority interest, and extraordinary item totaled $20,465,000 or $1.41 per share versus $12,120,000 or $.91 per share for the nine months ended September 30, 1995.
For the nine months ended September 30, 1996, net income included extraordinary item of $0.03 a share.
